https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/7vH2KmT7OoDv2CaD4fpp5rIeXjM.jpg A doctor broken by 8 years of war in North Africa tries to come back home. On his way, he is faced with a bigger challenge: save a city from the plague... and from madness. (IMDB) City of Shadows
